caption:
“Every sunrise is an answered prayer.”

Reflection:
Dawn whispers that mercy is renewed. The light we see each morning is grace reborn.

Commentary:
This reflection invites gratitude. Even the ordinary rising of the sun reveals divine faithfulness — a promise repeated daily.
